monster.name: Draconic Avatar

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: Your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: HP = ten times your warlock level.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: Add your proficiency bonus to AC, each saving throw, skill, and twice to your passive perception.

trait.name: Supernatural Avatar
trait.text: The draconic avatar doesn't need to eat, breathe, drink, or sleep, and is immune to magical sleep.

trait.name: Damage Type
trait.text: The draconic avatar has a damage type that affects its breath weapon, bite attack, and damage immunities. It is the same type as your patron's damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison).

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: 4 + PB to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus (2d6 + PB) damage of your patron's damage type.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: 4 + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (2d6 + 4 + PB) slashing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The draconic avatar exhales a powerful blast of its damage type. If the damage type is acid or lightning, the breath weapon is a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide and requires a Dexterity save against your spell save DC. If the damage type is cold, fire, or poison, the breath weapon is a 30-foot cone and requires a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (11d6) damage of your patron's damage type, or half that on a successful save.

monster.description: Source: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2 p. 39 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Arcane Mimic
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: See the Arcane Mimics and Transmogrification tables.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: Your spell save DC.

trait.name: Shapechanger
trait.text: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object its size or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
trait.text: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A creature up to one size larger than the mimic adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC equal to your spell save DC). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
trait.text: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
trait.text: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: your spellcasting attack modifier to hit, reach varies*, one target. Hit: varying piercing damage* plus acid damage equal to a number of d4s equal to the level of the spell slot used.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: your spellcasting attack modifier to hit, reach varies*, one target. Hit: varying* bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

monster.description:
AC = your spell save DC HP = varies Strength = varies Skills = Stealth 1 + Proficiency Bonus
*see the Arcane Mimics and Transmogrification tables
Transmogrification: Spell Slot Used | Maximum Size | Strength 1st | Tiny | 12 (+1) 2nd | Small | 14 (+2) 3rd | Medium | 16 (+3) 4th | Medium | 18 (+4) 5th | Large | 20 (+5) 6th | Large | 22 (+6) 7th | Huge | 24 (+7) 8th | Huge | 26 (+7) 9th | Gargantuan | 28 (+9)
Arcane Mimics Mimic Size | Hit Points | Attack Damage Tiny | 4 times the level of the spell slot used | 1d4 + the mimic's Strength modifier Small | 6 times the level of the spell slot used | 1d6 + the mimic's Strength modifier Medium | 8 times the level of the spell slot used | 1d8 + the mimic's Strength modifier Large | 10 times the level of the spell slot used | 2d8 + the mimic's Strength modifier Huge | 12 times the level of the spell slot used | 3d8 + the mimic's Strength modifier Gargantuan | 20 times the level of the spell slot used | 4d8 + the mimic's Strength modifier

monster.name: Swarm of Crawling Claws
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Damage Transfer
trait.text: While the swarm occupies the space of another creature, the swarm takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature in the swarm's space takes the other half.

trait.name: Horrific Horde
trait.text: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm's space must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, or else be frightened until the end of its next turn. A creature who succeeds on this throw is immune to the swarm's Horrific Horde trait for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny crawling claw. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
trait.text: The swarm of claws is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The swarm makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 14 (4d6) bludgeoning or slashing damage (swarm's choice), or 7 (2d6) bludgeoning or piercing damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

monster.description: Source: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2 p. 59 (Homebrew)

trait.name: Slimy and Sticky

trait.name: Standing Leap

trait.name: Swarm

trait.name: Rampaging Horde
trait.text: When the swarm reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the swarm can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a multiat tack.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a single member of the swarm. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) piercing damage, or 27 (6d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. The attack deals half damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d8) piercing damage, or half that if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

monster.name: Swarm of Kobolds
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Coordination
trait.text: The swarm has advantage on ability checks.

trait.name: Tactical Pack
trait.text: The swarm has advantage on all attack rolls against creatures in the swarm's space or within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the swarm has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The swarm makes three weapon attacks. It can replace two of these weapon attacks with a single hogtie.

action.name: Daggers
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (6d4) piercing damage, or half that if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Slings
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (6d4) bludgeoning damage, or half that if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Hogtie
action.text: The swarm engulfs a creature within its space, which must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or else become restrained by ropes and dropped prone by the kobolds. A creature can use its action to attempt a DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) or Wisdom (Survival) check, untying the ropes on a success.

monster.description: Source: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2 p. 62 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Swarm of Sprites
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Coordination
trait.text: The swarm has advantage on ability checks.

trait.name: Heart Sight
trait.text: The swarm automatically knows the current emotional state of any creature it touches. If a target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny sprite. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The swarm makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Little Longswords
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 10 (4d4) slashing damage, or 5 (2d4) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Little Shortbows
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or half that if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the poisoned target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Invisibility
action.text: The swarm magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the swarm wears or carries is invisible with it.

action.name: Lift
action.text: The swarm attempts to grab a creature within its space. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, or else be grappled and restrained by the swarm. The swarm can magically lift any Medium or smaller creature or object that weighs 500 pounds or less. As an action, the swarm can drop a held creature or object.

monster.description: Source: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2 p. 63 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Swarm of Stirges
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Damage Transfer
trait.text: While the swarm is attached to a creature, the swarm takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature the swarm is attached to takes the other half.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a single member of the swarm. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Blood Drain
action.text:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 25 (10d4) piercing damage or half that if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer, and the swarm attaches to the target. While attached, the swarm doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the swarm's turns, the target loses 25 (10d4) hit points due to blood loss, or half that if the swarm has half its hit point or fewer.
The swarm can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 50 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to attempt to remove the stirges. This requires a successful DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check.

monster.description: Source: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2 p. 63 (Homebrew)
